nodes.text: Carrotins were a type of vegetarian food edible by Wookiees. During the High Republic Era, a buffet table onboard the hospital ship Panacea included carrotins and pipfruit among its offerings, but no meat. Wookiee Jedi Padawan Burryaga Agaburry, approaching the table, noted the lack of meat as he felt he required more fortification at that moment than what carrotins could provide. Nevertheless, he took a plate of food.
